xmlText.p: CHICAGO WHITE SOX — Agreed to terms with 1B Diego Goris and LHP Matt Tomshaw on minor league contracts.

KANSAS CITY ROYALS — Agreed to terms with RHPs Miguel Almonte and Trevor Oaks; LHP Eric Skoglund; C Cam Gallagher; INFs Cheslor Cuthbert, Adalberto Mondesi and Ramon Torres; and OFs Jorge Bonifacio, Billy Burns, Paulo Orlando and Bubba Starling on one-year contracts and OF Michael Saunders on a minor league contract.
MINNESOTA TWINS — Agreed to terms with SS Erick Aybar on a minor league contract.<

TEXAS RANGERS — Agreed to terms with RHPs Clayton Blackburn, Matt Bush, Jonathan Hernandez, Ronald Herrera, Ariel Jurado, Jose Leclerc, Ricky Rodriguez and Connor Sadzeck; LHPs Brett Martin and Yohander Mendez; C Brett Nicholas and Jose Trevino; INFs Joey Gallo, Ronald Guzman, Isiah Kiner-Falefa, and Drew Robinson; and OFs Willie Calhoun, Delino DeShields, Nomar Mazara and Carlos Tocci on one-year contracts.<
CINCINNATI REDS — Agreed to terms with LHP Oliver Perez on a minor league contract.
COLORADO ROCKIES — Agreed to terms with RHP Junior Franco on a minor league contract.
PITTSBURGH PIRATES — Agreed to terms with LHP Kevin Siegrist on a minor league contract.<
ATLANTA HAWKS — Transferred G Josh Magette and F Andrew White III to Erie (NBAGL).
LOS ANGELES LAKERS — Assigned C Thomas Bryant to South Bay (NBAGL).<
ANAHEIM DUCKS — Recalled C Kalle Kossila from San Diego (AHL).
ARIZONA COYOTES — Recalled F Laurent Dauphin from Tucson (AHL).
CALGARY FLAMES — Assigned F Ryan Lomberg to Stockton (AHL). Placed G Mike Smith on injured reserve. Recalled Fs Tanner Glass and Andrew Mangiapane from Stockton.
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Recalled D Tyler Ganly from Greenville (ECHL) to Charlotte (AHL).
EDMONTON OILERS — Traded D Brandon Davidson to the N.Y. Islanders for a 2019 third-round draft pick.
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Assigned F Jonny Brodzinski and G Scott Wedgewood to Ontario (AHL). Recalled D Paul LaDue to Ontario.
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Assigned F Blake Pietila to Binghamton (AHL).
ST. LOUIS BLUES — Reassigned F Samuel Blais and D Chris Butler to San Antonio (AHL). Recalled D Jordan Schmaltz and F Tage Thompson from San Antonio.<
BINGHAMTON DEVILS — Returned LW Kevin Morris to Manchester (ECHL).
BRIDGEPORT SOUND TIGERS — Assigned Fs Matt Gaudreau and Kellen Jones to Worcester (ECHL).
CLEVELAND MONSTERS — Assigned G Ivan Kulbakov to Quad City (ECHL).
SPRINGFIELD THUNDERBIRDS — Assigned G Evan Cowley to Manchester (ECHL).<
CINCINNATI CYCLONES — Loaned F Brandon McNally to Chicago (AHL).
COLORADO EAGLES — Claimed F Nick Miglio off waivers from Kansas City.
QUAD CITY MALLARDS — Loaned G C.J. Motte to Stockton (AHL).
READING ROYALS — Released F Ryan Penny from his professional tryout agreement.<
COLORADO RAPIDS — Signed D Sam Vines to a three-year contract.<
PURDUE — Named Mark Tommerdahl special teams and tight ends coach.
